function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited testing capacity leading to biased view of infection trends.","Impact":"Failure to accurately assess the spread of the disease and identify hotspots.","Mitigation":"Increase testing capacity and prioritize testing for a wider range of suspected cases.","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, automated testing systems.","People":"General population, suspected cases, high-risk groups.","Owner":"Health authorities, government, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Reliance on reported deaths for estimating infection rates.","Impact":"Possibility of underestimating infection rates due to missed early deaths.","Mitigation":"Implement broader surveillance systems for identifying deaths related to the disease.","Technologies":"Data analytics, surveillance technology.","People":"Public health authorities, healthcare providers.","Owner":"Public health organizations, government."},{"Description":"Strong assumption of intervention efficacy across different countries.","Impact":"Misleading assessment of the effectiveness of interventions and their impact on Rt.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough analysis of intervention outcomes within each country and consider specific contextual factors.","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, modeling software.","People":"Epidemiologists, public health experts.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations."}]}
